data.message:
public class PhoneMessageServiceImpl implements PhoneMessageService {

@Resource
private PhoneMessageDao phonemessageDao;

@Override
public int addPhoneMessage(PhoneMessage phonemessage) {
return phonemessageDao.addPhoneMessage(phonemessage);
}

/**
* 指定时间范围内，返回指定发送电话号的短信数量
*/
@Override
public int getOnePhoneCountInDate(Date start, Date end, String phone) {
return phonemessageDao.getOnePhoneCountInDate(start, end, phone);
}

}
